summary: This mod edit, improve vanilla follower, artifact for player whose had many mod increase difficult of Skyrim.Also improve some creature and some follower you can summon from artifact and power
descriptionHtml:
You are the hardcore player, you wish having some trusty companion by your side, and some trusty artifact in your hand to adventure skyrim. No more looking. My mod improve all vanilla follower in all dlc , some creature you can summoned from artifact, power and two dragon you can call from shout(Durnehviir and Odahviing) also improve . All follower now have move speed 125(Original is 100), and no level cap, they level up with you. Some artifact and unique weapon, armor, now improve with appropriate enchantment and much more charge so you can use for longer before recharge.

If you found any bug, report to me and I will try to fix it.

Recommend play with Higher level enemies and start a new game with this mod

Require: All skyrim DLC or you will crash

P/s : Sorry if my grammar are wrong.

future: improve dragonborn artifact
author: NTN7991
